DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect Chen-style Tai Chi compare conventional exercise pulmonary rehabilitation COPD patient . Half participant receive Chen-style Tai Chi intervention , half receive conventional exercise intervention . Both group receive eduction support pulmonary rehabilitation .
DOC.brief_title: Chen-style Tai Chi Pulmonary Rehabilitation Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: FEV1 30 80 % predict normal value FEV1/FVC ratio < 70 % Patients severe COPD ( GOLD IV ) ; Patients COPD exacerbation within precede 2 week baseline assessment ; Significant hypoxemia rest exercise ( SpO2 < 85 % ) ; Already follow rehabilitation program ; Have physical limitation compromise participation Tai chi conventional exercise program
